item.description:
GOT KIDS? GRANDKIDS?

this showing is a matinee at 4:10 in the NASHUA Chunky's theater (Broad St off rte. 3, next street over from the Haluwa, in back of Home Depot).  If you are not familiar with Chunky's I can tell you it's a great place to eat and watch a movie, in nice big comfy leather chairs.

I've decided to take my grandchildren Mason 9 and Alyssa 4 to see this as it looks like it's the last day for the 3D version, and there are no showings of it in 3D in Pelham.  Unfortunately, it does cost $3 more for 3D, so it makes the matinee price of $5.25 actually $8.25.

I got a couple "combo" packs and can offer an admission, and a popcorn or sundae to anyone at 3:10 before we go in, for $7.00 (you can text me at 603-235-9373 when you get there, before buying a ticket if you're late, but NOT after the movie starts).  Even if you buy the pass with me, you will still be responsible to pay the extra $3 per ticket for the "3D" factor.  

here are the regular prices...the matinee ticket $5.25 ($3 more for 3D), sundae $4,99 (it's big) and popcorn $4.25 (yes, popcorn is a little pricey).   BTW, if you don't want 3D, you'll have to go to a showing of your own...lol.

I didn't pay for Alyssa last time because I think it was 4 and under are free.

I like to go in early and get good seats, and order drinks or food from their menu (check it out online at chunkys.com if you wish)

text me if you have any questions...or if you can't find me when you get there.

susan
item.how_to_find_us: meet in lobby by 3:10, one hour before showtime
item.name: THE LORAX IN 3D IN THE NASHUA CHUNKYS THEATER
